room_title: Escape room "Fenn's Gold" by King's Escape Room Denver in Denver
room_description: Forrest Fenn buried a treasure worth $2 million somewhere in the Rocky Mountains between Santa Fe and the Canadian border. He then wrote a poem about it. It has still not been found to this day. You must navigate the poem throughout the game to successfully find the treasure before nightfall. Can you be the one to finally solve the Forrest Fenn poem?
